metadata.title: Re-thinking newspaper workflows
metadata.description: The Neue Zürcher Zeitung, short NZZ, is the oldest of the major newspaper brands in Switzerland and has a rich history of quality journalism across borders. Like many bigger media companies, they applied a plethora of different tools and workflows across their titles. Their main CMS was Atex Polopoly. Due to the changing landscape of content consumption, they were faced with new challenges that couldn’t be solved in the old system.

content.title: How it works
content.text: You worry about the website, we handle the platform for you.

content.title: Our service
content.text: We provide you the Livingdocs Creation Platform as a service for your users or customers to produce outstanding content.

content.title: Your code
content.text: You create a stunning design and use our APIs and SDKs to build a website.

For the following procedures you have all the flexibility and freedom you wish. We offer you and your preferred web agencies, partners etc. fitted SDKs for easy, frictionless development and integration.

content.title: Design
content.text: Forget about template languages. With Livingdocs you write your design in plain HTML / CSS and web technologies. You develop your design in the frontend and can always play it back to our editor for WYSIWYG support.

content.title: Develop
content.text: React, vue, Angular, you name it. Our open-source Javascript SDKs allow you to get started with any frontend technology of your choice to build your customer-facing products.

content.title: Deploy
content.text: Livingdocs frontends can be quickly deployed to services such as now.sh or in high-availability infrastructures with Kubernetes on the Google Cloud. Our free frontend examples contain guides to get you started.
